#summary Anything pertaining to the Public World aspect of the game
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

A Public World is a [World] that is view-able by any player in the [Lobby Game Mode Lobby].

= Details =

  * Public Worlds are shown in the World listing in the [Lobby Game Mode Lobby] as Open Worlds.
    * An Open World is a world in which anyone can see and join.
  * Anyone can join a Public World, provided the World still has available room (which depends on the chosen maximum number of players for that [World]).
  * In [PvE], Public Worlds that have been previously joined will appear at the top of the [Lobby Game Mode Lobby] World listing.
  * In [PvP], the only [World Worlds] that will appear in the [Lobby Game Mode Lobby] World listing will be Public Worlds.
